subjects.cart_follow_up: Don't Miss Out on Your Experience

base.thank_you: Thank you for using our services.

cart_follow_up.exploring: We noticed you've been exploring the incredible world of {name}. It seems you have abandoned something in your cart.
cart_follow_up.benefits: Don't miss out on exclusive benefits and privileges where you have your eyes on.

notification.new_notification: You received a new notification at {name}
notification.can_disable: You can disable these email notifications in your personal settings.

payment_successful.payment_processed: your payment of {amount} has been successfully processed.
payment_successful.invoice_available: An invoice is available in your {purchase_history}.

subscription_cancelled.check_status: Check the current status in the {purchase_history}.

labels.unlinkAccountWarning: Deleting a user link will unlink the accounts. Admin-Status, Bans, Warnings, Purchases, Applied-Packets and Credits are affected by this and might not be handled the way you expect it. Check them afterwards to make sure everything is alright.

messages.removeAdminConfirmation: Do not forget to remove the former admin from the instance in your central instance overview.
messages.deleteUserText: Deleting a user also deletes all related bans, warnings, purchases, statistics, etc. This action can't be undone.

_ban.externalProtestUrlDescription: Leave empty for VyHub ticket system or enter link to redirect to external site.

messages.showingUserBans: Showing bans of user with ID: {id}

_theme.backgroundColorDescription: Color is overwritten by background image
_theme.logoDescription: Reload Page if logo is not displayed correctly

_settings.multigroupDescription: Users can be a member in multiple groups at once in this bundle.
_settings.backgroundColorDescription: Background image overwrites the background color
_settings.formulaTypeError: Check if all used Id's are present
_settings.formulaError: Formula not valid - check console for additional info
_settings.formulaBeta: This function is in beta phase. Please use with caution.
_settings.communityDescriptionDescr: This will be shown in search engine test results and when sharing in social media
_settings.languageNewDescriptionText: Help us translate to your language
_settings.showFirstStepsDescription: First steps tutorial in bottom right. (Admins only)

mappings.name: Name of the group/rank/role on the server

_group.isTeamDescription: Members of group will be shown on the team page

labels.invoiceLogoURLDetails: URL to a logo that is displayed on the invoice.
labels.taxIncludedInPacketPriceDescription: Instead of adding taxes to the specified packet price on top, they are included in the price.
labels.loginToBuy: Log in to buy this packet
labels.taxAllowUnknown: Allow purchases from countries without tax rule.
labels.taxAllowUnknownDescription: If disabled, purchases from countries that do not have an explicit tax rule configured, are not possible.
labels.widgetDescription: Widget component displayed throughout the website (News, Shop, Home)
labels.creditsDisplayTitleDescription: Rename payment credits to anything you like (gulden, diamonds, coins...)
labels.redirectDescription: You will be redirected to the payment provider.

messages.confirmCouponPayment: Please enter your {gateway_name} code. The payment is then manually approved by a team member.
messages.couponsEntered: Your coupon was successfully added. You can edit your coupon until your purchase got approved.
messages.notEnoughCredits: You do not have enough {credits_display_title} to pay this purchase. Please choose a different payment method or buy more {credits_display_title}.
messages.addToCartError: An error occurred while adding the packet to your cart.
messages.startingPaymentFailed: There was an error while initiating the payment. Please try again or use an other payment method!
messages.paymentActionFailed: There was an error while redirecting you to the payment page. Please try again or use an other payment method! Error message: {message}
messages.paymentCancelled: This payment has been cancelled. You can try it again by visiting your shopping cart.
messages.paymentSuccess: The payment has been finished successfully and the purchased packets have been activated.
messages.paymentFailed: An error occurred during the payment process. Please try to restart the process.
messages.paymentPending: This payment is pending. Please complete it by visiting the shopping cart.
messages.paymentProcessing: The payment has been approved and will be finished soon. Please wait a few minutes on this page while your payment is being processed.
messages.couponNotApplied: Coupon could not be applied to any packet in your cart.
messages.selectBillingAddressFirst: Please select a billing address first.
messages.selectEmailFirst: Please update your email address first
messages.cancelPurchaseConfirmation: Started payments are cancelled. All entered coupons are lost. Cancelling a purchase cannot be undone.
messages.targetUserChanged: The target user has been changed
messages.priceMustBeHigherThanMin: The price must be higher than the minimum price.

_errors.country_not_allowed: Purchases from your country are not allowed.
_errors.requirement_parse_error: Could not parse requirements formula. Please contact an admin.
_errors.cart_not_empty: Your cart must be empty to add this packet.
_errors.packet_requires_other: This packet requires an other packet: {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_not_compatible: This packet is not compatible with an other packet: {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_relation_violated: This packet violates a packet relation with an other packet: {relation_type} {packet_title}.
_errors.packet_already_in_cart: This packet is already in your cart.
_errors.missing_properties: You do not have all required properties: {properties}
_errors.unauthorized: You must be logged in to do this.
_errors.wrong_currency: You cannot have packets with different currencies in your cart.
_errors.ban_protest_open: There already exists an open protest for this ban.
_errors.too_many_ban_protests: There are already 3 protests for this ban.

messages.linkAccountConfirm: Are you sure that you want to link these two user accounts?

_user.userLinkDescription: Linking a user will perform some magic to combine your accounts. Beware, this magic can not be undone!
_user.userLoginShopDescription: Please login so we can identify you in game.

labels.authRequestDescription: Execute the following command on a {type} server to login:

CENTRAL.name: VyHub Central
CENTRAL.info: The platform to manage and monetize your gameservers.

DISCORD.name: Discord
DISCORD.info: Your place to talk and hang out.

FIVEM.name: FiveM
FIVEM.info: Rev Up, Team Up, Rule the Streets of Los Santos.

ASA.name: ARK: Survival Ascended
ASA.info: Tame the Wild, Master the Dinosaurs.

_legal.descriptionText: In most countries it is mandatory to have at least the website operators contact details, terms of use and a privacy policy. You can find an example privacy policy in the docs.
_legal.showLegalReminder: Please set legal information in the settings!

_navigation.title: Navigation
_navigation.bothHtmlInputsUsed: Do not use both HTML inputs
_navigation.contentSanitizationWarning: JavaScript is only allowed to be used by Admins. Otherwise it is going to be sanitized.

messages.limitReached: Log limit reached. Some older logs may not be displayed.
messages.limitReachedFilter: Log limit reached. Some older logs may not be displayed. Use a smaller time range or a more specific filter.

labels.buyableDetail: Can be purchased in the shop
labels.enabledDetail: If disabled, the packet cannot be purchased and all assigned packets become inactive.
labels.abstractDetail: Short bullet points that describe the key features of the packet.
labels.recurringDetail: A subscription is created, with the interval given in the 'Active for' field.
labels.buyableActive: Buyable if the user has this packet in an active state.
labels.buyableInactive: Buyable if the user has this packet in an inactive state.
labels.activeForDetail: Duration of the packet following activation. Leave this field empty for packets that should not be disabled over time. If the recurring option is enabled, this value is used as the subscription interval.
labels.limitPaymentMethodsDetail: If payment methods are selected, only these can be used. If not, all methods can be used.
labels.customPriceDetail: Let the user decide the price. The entered price above is used as the minimal price.
labels.relationDisables: Disables the selected packet on purchase
labels.relationRequires: Requires the selected packet for a purchase
labels.relationNotCompatible: Not compatible with the selected packet.
labels.relationUpgrades: Can be used to upgrade the selected packet.
labels.imageDetail: A HTTPS URL to the packet image.
labels.recommendableDescription: The packet may be recommended to users in the "Recommendations"/ "Recommended for you" sections.

messages.sortOnlyWithCategory: Packets can only be sorted if a category is selected.
messages.customPricePossible: The price for this packet can be customized.
messages.deleteWarning: Caution! Deleting a packet also deletes all related applied packets, applied rewards and purchase items. Maybe disable the packet instead?

labels.imageDetail: An HTTPS URL to the category image.

labels.checkForReplacements: Check the docs for available reward types and string replacements
labels.reactivateOnExtend: Execute again if packet has been extended (on subscription payment)
labels.amountOfAppliedRewardsToPatch: Amount of applied rewards to patch: {amount}
labels.packetSyncLimitDescription: Rewards are added to all packets with begin dates in the range given. Begin and end are optional.

_events.disable: Execute when applied packet becomes inactive

_types.command: Execute a command on the server(s)
_types.script: Execute a script on the server(s)

labels.notAffectedByRangeSelector: Statistic not affected by range selector
labels.confirmDebitText: Confirm Purchase? This can't be undone.
labels.declineDebitText: Cancel Purchase? This can't be undone.

messages.refundConfirm: Are you sure that you want to refund this purchase?
messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this purchase? This action can't be undone. Related applied packets will not be deleted.
messages.cancelSubscriptionConfirm: Are you sure that you want to cancel this subscription?

_component.specifyServers: Specify up to two servers in the settings

_form.headline: Headline
_form.question: Question
_form.app: App - Display on top of page

labels.clientCertDescription: A client certificate and key is used as authentication method for the paysafecard API. Contact the paysafecard support to get one.
labels.acceptPendingDescription: Some payment methods (e.g. SEPA Direct Debit, SOFORT, ...) take several days until completed. If this option is enabled, purchases paid with these methods are finished directly after completing the checkout process. There is a small chance that the payment fails afterwards.
labels.imageUrlDescription: Optional. Default images are used, when no link is provided.
labels.paypalLegacyHint: This PayPal integration is easy to setup and also works with non-business accounts. However, it does not support refunds and subscription payments. If possible, use the normal PayPal integration.
labels.paypalHint: This PayPal integration requires a PayPal business account. If you do not have one, upgrade your PayPal account or use the PayPal (Easy) integration.

messages.deleteWarning: Caution! Deleting a payment gateway causes the deletion of all purchases and payments where the gateway has been used! This action can't be undone. Maybe disable it instead?
messages.attributeChangeExplanation: The attributes below will not be edited if no value is given. Secret attributes are write-only, meaning your input will not be shown again.

messages.allCountriesDetail: Leave blank to target all countries.
messages.infoDetail: Will be shown during checkout and on the invoice.

_notification.applied_packet_upgraded: Your packet {old_packet_title} has been upgraded with {new_packet_title}.
_notification.purchase_finished: Your purchase of {amount} has been finished!
_notification.purchase_cancelled: Your purchase of {amount} has been cancelled!
_notification.coupon_purchase_new: {username} submitted {gateway_name} codes ({amount_total} {currency_symbol}) that need to be approved.

_warning.title: Warnings
_warning.ttlDescription: Time until warning is marked as expired
_warning.countTillBan: Number of warnings till automatic ban
_warning.settingFormDesc: Users are banned automatically when they reach the specified number of ACTIVE warnings.
_warning.showUserWarnings: Showing warnings of user with ID: {id}

labels.discordEnterIdAsAddress: Enter your guilds id as server address. Enter your favourite number as port.
labels.queryPortDescription: Query port of your TS3 server. The standard port is 10022.

COMMON.runCommands: Generate the required commands by clicking the button and execute them in the server console of your server.
COMMON.wait: Wait up to a minute for VyHub to initialize. There will be a message in the server console if the connection was successful.

GMOD.download: Download the vyhub-gmod addon, unpack it and put it into the addons folder of your server. Then restart your server.
GMOD.serverConsoleHint: Important: The server console is NOT the console in the game (when pressing F10).

MINECRAFT.download: Download the vyhub-minecraft plugin .jar and put it into the plugins folder of your server. Then restart your server.

ASA.download: Download the vyhub-asa plugin and put it into the plugins folder of your server. Then restart your server.

DISCORD.createApp: Create a Discord application and enable Discord authorization.
DISCORD.readInstructions: Read and follow the further instructions in the docs.
DISCORD.addBot: Add the Bot to your Discord server. Click reload if the button is not working.
DISCORD.restartBot: [Optional] You are experiencing issues like the bot has not been started? Please check the logs for helpful error-messages. You can restart the bot manually here.

TEAMSPEAK3.headline: The TS3 bot should already be connected to your Teamspeak server.
TEAMSPEAK3.botNotConnected: The bot is not connected? Enable the display of query bots first. Every time you change the server settings, the bot tries to reconnect. You may find error messages in the log.

FIVEM.download: Download the vyhub-fivem plugin and add it to your server.

RUST.download: Download the vyhub-umod (Rust & 7 Days To Die) plugin and add it to your server.

_server.deleteServerbundleConfirmationText: Deleting a serverbundle will also delete all depending objects (rewards, servers, bans, warnings, ...). This action cannot be undone.

_server_exception.begin_smaller_end: Begin Date has to be after End Date

messages.description: In this section, you can import data from other systems.

labels.urlDescription: URL to your GExtension site without index.php. Example: https://mycommunity.com/gextension/
labels.apiKeyDescription: Copy your API key from the GExtension settings.

messages.import1Description: VyHub is now ready to import the first objects: Groups, Serverbundles and Users. Make sure to start the import process in this order.
messages.import2Description: You can now import the additional objects below. The order is not relevant.
messages.packetsDataDescription: Select which VyHub packet should be given to owners of GExtension packets. It is also possible to exclude some rewards. If no GExtension packets are selectable, make sure that your URL and API key are correct. Start the packet import afterwards.
messages.basicDataDescription: Insert the URL to your GExtension site (without index.php). Make sure to use GExtension version 2.7.8 or newer.

_serverDashboard.selectAUser: Select a user to see details.

_faq.html: HTML is allowed in this field.

_forum.allowEditPostDescription: Allow users to edit their own posts.
_forum.creator: Creator
_forum.prohibitCreateThreadsDescription: Prevent users from creating new threads. This does not affect users with the 'Manage Forum' permission or Topic Admins.

messages.tooManyLabels: You can only add up to 4 labels.
messages.oldThread: This thread is older than 3 months. Consider creating a new thread because the thread could be outdated.
messages.closedThread: You are about to reply to a closed thread.
messages.banned: You are banned from the forum and cannot create new threads or posts.

descriptions.user_ignore_target_level: Allows editing a user regardless of its level and allows to add any group memberships.
descriptions.user_morph: Allow to act as an other user. Only supported for some endpoints.
descriptions.user_comment_delete: Delete user comments of other users
descriptions.ban_comment_delete: Delete ban comments of other users
descriptions.account_show: View credit accounts of other users
descriptions.account_edit: Edit credit account transactions of users
descriptions.reserved_slot_use: Use reserved slots on a server
descriptions.forum_post: Prevent users from posting in the forum
descriptions.ticket_create: Prevent users from creating tickets and ban-protests
descriptions.shop_use: Prevent users from using the shop

_chat.loginRequired: Login required to use the chat

_firstSteps.login: Login with VyHub Central to become admin
_firstSteps.syncGroups: Synchronize groups between VyHub and your server
_firstSteps.createGroup: Create a group with a group Mapping
